properties.name: finnhub.api.key.1
properties.description: First API key for Finnhub multi-key WebSocket service

properties.name: finnhub.api.key.2
properties.description: Second API key for Finnhub multi-key WebSocket service

properties.name: finnhub.api.key.3
properties.description: Third API key for Finnhub multi-key WebSocket service (optional)

properties.name: finnhub.websocket.max-symbols
properties.description: Maximum number of symbols per WebSocket connection

properties.name: finnhub.scheduled.websocket.enabled
properties.description: Enable scheduled WebSocket management based on US market hours
